msg.msgText: The client failed to parse a JMS message object received from Message Gateway because the length specified for the message properties does not match the length of the content found.

msgExplanation.p: A JMS message object received from Message Gateway could not be properly parsed because the data is not valid.

msgUserResponse.p: Check the message content originally provided by the producer. Corruption can occur in transmission from the producer to Message Gateway or in transmission from Message Gateway to the consumer.
